attributes.action: Intervene to stop post-election violence and guarantee the safety and security of opposition activists and media reporters in Sri Lanka
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According to the International Media reports (including BBC reports) Pre and post presidential election period has been tainted by violence in Sri Lanka.

The Sri Lankan expatriates in United Kingdom and concerned British citizens kindly urge the British Government to immediately intervene to stop post-election violence, guarantee the safety and security of opposition activists including Gen. Sarath Fonseka, media freedom and to strengthen the democracy in Sri Lanka.
